Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends Object
    Represents a triangle with 3 sides and provides a classification of the triangle (equilateral, scalene, not a triangle, or isosceles.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double s1 
      private double s2 
      private double s3 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Triangle(double side1, double side2, double side3)
      Initializes a Triangle object given the length of its 3 sides.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Object o)
      Determines of if corresponding sides are equal.
      String getClassification()
      Returns the classsification of the triangle based on the length of its 3 sides.
      double getS1()
      Getter for s1.
      double getS2()
      Getter for s2.
      double getS3()
      Getter for s3.
      int hashCode() 
      double perimeter()
      Returns the perimeter of the triangle (i.e., returns the sum of the lengths of the 3 sides).
      String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the triangle including the length of its 3 sides and its classification.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
